title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:prevent_elytra_flight'
- Prevents the entity that has the power from flying with either an Elytra item or a power that uses the Elytra Flight (Power Type).

entity_action.description: If specified, execute this entity action type upon preventing the entity that has the power.
